name: WinterBear Band
description:
This project made for Weekly Game Jam

Week 181 Theme: 'New Year's Countdown'

“WinterBear Band is a cute fairy tale about Bear, the lead singer of a forest music group. His friends decided to present a song as a gift for the New year. But there is one problem. As a rule, bears hibernate in winter! So, the main Teddy Bear's goal is to wake up before the New Year party in order not to miss the last rehearsal. What will happen if he oversleeps?”

The plot of the game is based on references to Slavic fairy tales.

Controls:

Move - A D

Jump - W

Interact, Click dialog (answer) - Е

Click dialog (answer) LeftMouse

Mini Game -  ↑ ↓ ← →
